The one-time event Illithid Invasion is active across all servers! See here for more!

Category:Feet items

Clothing Jewelry

Helms
Gloves
Cloaks
Belts
Boots
Bracers
Goggles
Necklaces
Rings
Trinkets

Boots, greaves etc.

Boots are items that go on your feet. They can be enchanted randomly with one of the Clothing enhancements or be one of the named drops found below.


Item Special Abilities ML Bind Quest Chest
Sludge Fin Boots
  • Swim +7Swim +7: Passive: +7 Competence bonus to the Swim skill.
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 3 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Lost Seekers
Surefoot Boots
  • Balance +3Balance +3: Passive: +3 Competence bonus to the Balance skill.
  • Move Silently +3Move Silently +3: Passive: +3 Competence bonus to the Move Silently skill.
 None Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Seal of Shan-To-Kor
Switchblade Boots
  • Bluff +9Bluff +9: Passive: +9 Competence bonus to the Bluff skill.
  • Seeker +5 Seeker +5: Provides a +5 Enhancement bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +5 Enhancement bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 7 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire The Missing Party End chest
Krugg's Spiked Boots
  • Striding +10%Striding +10%: Makes the wearer more fleet of foot, giving a 10% bonus to run speed.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 5 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire Assault on Splinterskull
Boots of Faith
  • Jump +5Jump +5: Passive: +5 Competence bonus to the Jump skill.
  • Feather FallingFeather Falling: This item is engraved with feathers and bestows a powerful magical effect. Whenever the wearer begins to fall from any height, this effect slows the descent dramatically, causing the wearer to fall like a feather.
  • Yellow Augment Slot: EmptyYellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness

Kundarak Delving Boots
  • Freedom of MovementFreedom of Movement: This item grants its wearer the ability to move and attack normally while under the influence of magic that impedes movement, such as paralysis, solid fog, slow and web.
  • Speed +19% Speed +19%: +19% enhancement bonus to movement speed, 6% bonus to attack speed.
  • Hide +11Hide +11: Passive: +11 Competence bonus to the Hide skill.
  • Move Silently +11Move Silently +11: Passive: +11 Competence bonus to the Move Silently skill.
  • Kundarak Delving EquipmentKundarak Delving Equipment: 3 Pieces Equipped: +1 Artifact bonus to Sneak Attack Dice. +5% Artifact bonus to Helplessness Damage. +5% Artifact bonus to Doublestrike and Doubleshot
 9 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Plane of Night Warded Chest
Dustless Boots
  • Assassinate +7 Assassinate +7: +7 Enhancement bonus to the DC of character's Assassinate attempts.
  • Insightful Deception +2Insightful Deception +2: +2 Insight bonus to hit and +3 to damage for any hit that would qualify as a sneak attack.
  • Speed +21% Speed +21%: +21% enhancement bonus to movement speed, 8% bonus to attack speed.
  • Move Silently +13Move Silently +13: Passive: +13 Competence bonus to the Move Silently skill.
  • Windlasher's FerocityWindlasher's Ferocity: 2 Pieces Equipped:
    +5% Artifact bonus to Doublestrike and Doubleshot
    +5 Artifact bonus to Melee and Ranged Power
 11 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Zawabi's Revenge Warded Chest
Gyroscopic Boots of Striding
  • Balance +10Balance +10: Passive: +10 Competence bonus to the Balance skill.
  • Striding +30%Striding +30%: Makes the wearer more fleet of foot, giving a 30% bonus to run speed.

Madstone Boots
  • Dexterity +4 Dexterity +4: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
  • Potency +48Potency +48: Passive: +48 Equipment bonus to each Spell Power.
  • Striding +20%Striding +20%: Makes the wearer more fleet of foot, giving a 20% bonus to run speed.
  • Madstone RageMadstone Rage
    Caster level: 5
    Charges: 1 (1/day)     — 1 Charges (Recharged/Day:1)
  • Hidden effect: Madstone ReactionMadstone Reaction: Characters wearing the Madstone Boots have approximately a 15% chance of triggering Madstone Rage each time they are hit.
    This effect stacks with the Madstone Rage clicky.
  • Upgradeable Item (Stormreaver)Upgradeable Item (Stormreaver): This item could be upgraded if you found a Seal of the Stormreaver to combine it with. Bring this item to the Stormreaver Monument in Gianthold and combine it with a Seal of the Stormreaver to upgrade the item to a more powerful form.
 13 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire The Reaver's Fate Raid Warded chest

  • Tumble +3Tumble +3: Passive: +3 Competence bonus to the Tumble skill.

  • PathfindersPathfinders: To-Hit Bonus +2 (untyped, fully stacks)

Firestorm Greaves
  • Fire Absorption +21% Fire Absorption +21%: Passive: 21% Enhancement Bonus to Fire Absorption. (Absorption reduces damage from an element by a percentage, after resistance have been taken into account.)

Masei Mkembe sells for 625 Antique Bronze Tokens
Golden Greaves
  • Speed +21% Speed +21%: +21% enhancement bonus to movement speed, 8% bonus to attack speed.
  • Proof Against Disease +5 Proof Against Disease +5: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +5 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 6 + their Fortitude save).
  • Proof Against Poison +5 Proof Against Poison +5: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +5 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 6 + their Fortitude save).
  • DRDamage Reduction 15/-: Reduces all physical damage by 15. 15/-
  • Colorless Augment Slot: EmptyColorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • The Desert's Writhing StormThe Desert's Writhing Storm: 2 Pieces Equipped:
    +2% Artifact bonus to Electric Spellcrit Chance
    +10 Artifact bonus to Electric Spellpower
    +10 Artifact bonus to Magical Resistance Rating

  • Speed +30% Speed +30%: +30% enhancement bonus to movement speed, 15% bonus to attack speed.
  • Proof Against Disease +8 Proof Against Disease +8: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +8 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 9 + their Fortitude save).
  • Proof Against Poison +8 Proof Against Poison +8: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +8 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 9 + their Fortitude save).
  • DRDamage Reduction 15/-: Reduces all physical damage by 15. 15/-

  • Striding +30%Striding +30%: Makes the wearer more fleet of foot, giving a 30% bonus to run speed.
  • Feather FallingFeather Falling: This item is engraved with feathers and bestows a powerful magical effect. Whenever the wearer begins to fall from any height, this effect slows the descent dramatically, causing the wearer to fall like a feather.
  • Jet PropulsionJet Propulsion: Use this item to activate the air elemental bound within, thus propelling you forward at great speeds. It takes ten minutes to recharge between uses.

  • Halcyon MindHalcyon Mind: When you are damaged by an attack: 5% chance to gain 15 Temporary Spell Points. These Temporary Spell Points last for one minute, or until consumed to cast a spell.
  • Dexterity +8 Dexterity +8: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +8 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
  • Striding +30%Striding +30%: Makes the wearer more fleet of foot, giving a 30% bonus to run speed.
  • Potency +80Potency +80: Passive: +80 Equipment bonus to each Spell Power.
  • Attuned to HeroismThis relic is attuned to heroic actions. (Special bonus effect! Please see item's specific page for details.)

Treads of Falling Shadow (Level 18)
  • Striding +30%Striding +30%: Makes the wearer more fleet of foot, giving a 30% bonus to run speed.
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • Dexterity +6 Dexterity +6: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
  • Insightful Dexterity +2Insightful Dexterity +2: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +2 insight bonus to Dexterity.

Treads of Falling Shadow (Level 16)
  • Striding +25%Striding +25%: Makes the wearer more fleet of foot, giving a 25% bonus to run speed.
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • Dexterity +6 Dexterity +6: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
  • Exceptional Dexterity +1Exceptional Dexterity +1: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +1 exceptional bonus to Dexterity.

  • Quality Physical Sheltering +8Quality Physical Sheltering +8: +8 Quality bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
  • Insightful Physical Sheltering +16Insightful Physical Sheltering +16: +16 Insight bonus to Physical Resistance Rating

Legendary Knife Toed Boots
  • Thorn Guard +6Thorn Guard +6: When you are hit or missed in combat, this item has a chance to deal 6d8 Piercing damage on hit.
  • Armor-Piercing - 20% Armor-Piercing - 20%: Passive: +20% Enhancement bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)
  • Quality Strength +3Quality Strength +3: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +3 quality bonus to Strength.
  • Quality Seeker +3Quality Seeker +3: Provides a +3 Quality bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +3 Quality bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).

Cobalt Guard
  • Improved Quelling StrikesImproved Quelling Strikes: On Vorpal Melee: applies a Quell effect to target enemy for six seconds, rendering them unable to cast divine spells. This has a 50% chance of preventing the target from casting all spells for three seconds (12 second cooldown).
  • Greater Dispelling GuardGreater Dispelling Guard: This item is infused with a power that purges out the magical energies of those that strike the wearer. When the wearer is hit in melee it will apply a Greater Dispel Magic effect to the attacker, stripping away its protective spells.

Legendary Softsole Slippers
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • AnthemAnthem: When equipped by a character with Bard levels, this item begins to hum an inspiring tune. Your bard songs regenerate slowly over time.
  • Perform +20Perform +20: Passive: +20 Competence bonus to the Perform skill.
  • Insightful Charisma +6Insightful Charisma +6: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +6 insight bonus to Charisma.

Softsole Slippers
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • AnthemAnthem: When equipped by a character with Bard levels, this item begins to hum an inspiring tune. Your bard songs regenerate slowly over time.
  • Perform +12Perform +12: Passive: +12 Competence bonus to the Perform skill.
  • Insightful Charisma +2Insightful Charisma +2: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +2 insight bonus to Charisma.
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • Adherent of the Mists Set (Heroic)Adherent of the Mists Set (Heroic): 5 Pieces Equipped:
    +5 Profane bonus to Physical Resistance Rating
    +10 Profane bonus to Positive, Negative, and Repair Amplification
    +5 Profane bonus to Melee and Ranged Power
    +10 Profane bonus to Universal Spell Power

  • Dexterity +6 Dexterity +6: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +6 enhancement bonus to Dexterity.
  • Insightful Dodge +2%Insightful Dodge +2%: +2% Insightful bonus to Dodge.
  • Doubleshot 4% Doubleshot 4%: Passive: 4% Enhancement bonus to Doubleshot. (Doubleshot is a chance to score an additional hit with a ranged attack.)

  • Whirlwind WardWhirlwind Ward: This effect renders you immune to being knocked down by an Air Elemental's whirlwind. However, it does not prevent you from being knocked back or away from touching the Air Elemental.

Stone Shoes
  • Insightful Corrosion +47Insightful Corrosion +47: Passive: +47 Insightful bonus to Acid Spell Power.
  • Quality Corrosion +23Quality Corrosion +23: Passive: +23 Quality bonus to Acid Spell Power.
  • Weighty AssetWeighty Asset: This item is so heavy you find it hard to be dragged anywhere - even to your grave. You benefit from a +100 Enhancement bonus to increased unconsciousness range.
  • Parrying +3Parrying +3: +3 Insight bonus to Armor Class, +3 Insight bonus to Saves.
  • Sink Like a BrickSink Like a Brick: These boots are made of concrete. You sink in water.
  • Earthgrab GuardEarthgrab Guard: This item stores the implacable strength of the earth deep within. When the wearer of this item is successfully attacked in melee, this power occasionally comes to the surface, calling on the earth to erupt from the ground and hold an enemy in place.

Spectre Boots
  • Ghostly Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.

Legendary Green Steel Weave Boots
  • Legendary Taint of ShavarathLegendary Taint of Shavarath: Green Steel items thirst for pain and suffering. While weapons feed their bloodlust on enemies, accessories and clothing cannot. Wearing multiple items that bear the Legendary Taint of Shavarath creates dangerous imbalances of energy as the items feed more and more upon the wielder. Perhaps there is a way to appease this item...

  • Feather FallingFeather Falling: This item is engraved with feathers and bestows a powerful magical effect. Whenever the wearer begins to fall from any height, this effect slows the descent dramatically, causing the wearer to fall like a feather.

Red Dragonscale Boots
  • Fire Shield (Hot)Fire Shield (Hot): When you are successfully attacked, there is a 10% chance that a Fire Shield (Hot) will be cast on you. If this effect activates while you have an active Fire Shield (Cold) from another item source, they will nullify each-other.
  • Seeker +4 Seeker +4: Provides a +4 Enhancement bonus to confirm critical hits, and a +4 Enhancement bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).

  • Freedom of MovementFreedom of Movement: This item grants its wearer the ability to move and attack normally while under the influence of magic that impedes movement, such as paralysis, solid fog, slow and web.

The Repulsor Boots
  • Enhanced Jet PropulsionEnhanced Jet Propulsion: Use this item to activate the air elemental bound within, thus propelling you forward at great speeds. It takes five minutes to recharge between uses.
  • Speed +30% Speed +30%: +30% enhancement bonus to movement speed, 15% bonus to attack speed.
  • Insightful Mighty Skills Bonus +10Insightful Mighty Skills Bonus: +10 Insight bonus to Jump and Swim.
  • Quality Mighty Skills Bonus +5Quality Mighty Skills Bonus: +5 Quality bonus to Jump and Swim.

Legendary Golden Greaves
  • Speed +30% Speed +30%: +30% enhancement bonus to movement speed, 15% bonus to attack speed.
  • Proof Against Disease +11 Proof Against Disease +11: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +11 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 12 + their Fortitude save).
  • Proof Against Poison +11 Proof Against Poison +11: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +11 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 12 + their Fortitude save).

  • Sound and SilenceSound and Silence: When true power is spoken, weaker beings cannot refute it. Your offensive spells and attacks have a small chance to cause 10d20 Sonic Damage to nearby enemies and Silence them. Each target can negate the Silence on Will save vs DC 90.

Legendary Warded Sewer Waders
  • Proof Against Poison +11 Proof Against Poison +11: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural poisons. This item also grants a +11 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical poisons, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 12 + their Fortitude save).
  • Proof Against Disease +11 Proof Against Disease +11: This item grants its wearer immunity to natural diseases. This item also grants a +11 Enhancement bonus to saving throws against magical diseases, and the wearer does not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders the wearer immune to magical diseases with a DC of less than 12 + their Fortitude save).
  • Quality Fortitude Save +3Quality Fortitude Save +3: This item gives a +3 Quality bonus to your Fortitude saves.

Legendary Steel-Toed Steps
  • Insightful Strength +6Insightful Strength +6: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +6 insight bonus to Strength.
  • Quality Combat Mastery +3Quality Combat Mastery +3: +3 Quality bonus to the DC to resist the character's Trip, Improved Trip, Sunder, Improved Sunder, Stunning Blow, and Stunning Fist attempts.
  • Speed +30% Speed +30%: +30% enhancement bonus to movement speed, 15% bonus to attack speed.
  • Diehard Diehard: If you are incapacitated while this item is equipped, it will automatically stabilize you as if you had the Diehard feat.
  • Legendary Forbidden KnowledgeLegendary Forbidden Knowledge: 3 Pieces Equipped:
    +30 Profane bonus to PRR
    4 Pieces Equipped:
    +3 Profane bonus to all ability scores
    +4 Profane bonus to attack and damage
    5 Pieces Equipped:
    +15 Profane bonus to Melee and Ranged Power
    +25 Profane bonus to Universal Spell Power
    +3 Profane bonus to Spell DCs
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
  • Colorless Augment Slot: EmptyColorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 32 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire Turn the Page (quest) End chest
Steel-Toed Steps
  • Insightful Strength +4Insightful Strength +4: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +4 insight bonus to Strength.
  • Quality Combat Mastery +2Quality Combat Mastery +2: +2 Quality bonus to the DC to resist the character's Trip, Improved Trip, Sunder, Improved Sunder, Stunning Blow, and Stunning Fist attempts.
  • Speed +28% Speed +28%: +28% enhancement bonus to movement speed, 13% bonus to attack speed.
  • Diehard Diehard: If you are incapacitated while this item is equipped, it will automatically stabilize you as if you had the Diehard feat.
  • Forbidden KnowledgeForbidden Knowledge: 3 Pieces Equipped:
    +10 Profane bonus to PRR
    4 Pieces Equipped:
    +1 Profane bonus to all ability scores
    +1 Profane bonus to attack and damage
    5 Pieces Equipped:
    +5 Profane bonus to Melee and Ranged Power
    +10 Profane bonus to Universal Spell Power
    +1 Profane bonus to Spell DCs
  • Blue Augment Slot: EmptyBlue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 18 Bound to Account on AcquireBound to Account on Acquire: This item is Bound to Account on Acquire Turn the Page (quest) End chest
The Shadow Flight
  • Quality Intelligence +3Quality Intelligence +3: This item focuses the power of the wearer's mind, granting a +3 quality bonus to Intelligence.
  • Assassinate +17 Assassinate +17: +17 Enhancement bonus to the DC of character's Assassinate attempts.
  • Insightful Armor-Piercing - 11%Insightful Armor-Piercing - 11%: Passive: +11% Insight bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)
  • Enhanced GhostlyEnhanced Ghostly: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 15% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.
  • Legendary Forbidden KnowledgeLegendary Forbidden Knowledge: 3 Pieces Equipped:
    +30 Profane bonus to PRR
    4 Pieces Equipped:
    +3 Profane bonus to all ability scores
    +4 Profane bonus to attack and damage
    5 Pieces Equipped:
    +15 Profane bonus to Melee and Ranged Power
    +25 Profane bonus to Universal Spell Power
    +3 Profane bonus to Spell DCs

The Devouring Way
  • Quality Constitution +3Quality Constitution +3: This item gives the wearer improved health, granting a +3 quality bonus to Constitution.
  • Quality Incite +31Quality Incite +31: +31% Quality bonus to increased threat generation from melee damage
  • Insightful Intimidate +11Insightful Intimidate +11: Passive: +11 Insight bonus to the Intimidate skill.

The Kept Descent
  • Quality Wisdom +3Quality Wisdom +3: This item makes the wearer more in tune with her surroundings, granting a +3 quality bonus to Wisdom.
  • Profane Negative Amplification +63Negative Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming negative energy healing by +63 (Profane bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
  • Quality Negative Amplification +16Negative Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming negative energy healing by +16 (Quality bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
  • Insightful Armor-Piercing - 11%Insightful Armor-Piercing - 11%: Passive: +11% Insight bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)

The Traveling Flow
  • Quality Charisma +3Quality Charisma +3: This item makes the wearer have more flair, granting a +3 quality bonus to Charisma.
  • Freedom of MovementFreedom of Movement: This item grants its wearer the ability to move and attack normally while under the influence of magic that impedes movement, such as paralysis, solid fog, slow and web.
  • Insightful Armor-Piercing - 11%Insightful Armor-Piercing - 11%: Passive: +11% Insight bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)
  • Perform +22Perform +22: Passive: +22 Competence bonus to the Perform skill.

The Mocking Passage
  • Quality Dexterity +3Quality Dexterity +3: This item makes the wearer more nimble and dexterous, granting a +3 quality bonus to Dexterity.
  • Profane Lifeforce +52Profane Lifeforce +52: +52 Profane bonus to Hit Points.
  • Insightful Spell Focus Mastery +3Insightful Spell Focus Mastery +3: +3 Insight bonus to the DC of all spells.

    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Colorless Augments
    • Named: Category:Colorless augments
    • Ability (Enhancement bonus): +1 to +14
    • Ability (Exceptional bonus): +1
    • Ability (Insight bonus): +5
    • Skills, except UMD (Competence bonus): +5 to +20
 32 Bound to Character on AcquireBound to Character on Acquire: This item is Bound to Character on Acquire Vecna Unleashed any legendary end chest or Vecna Unleashed (epic) saga end reward (Epic Hard or above)
The Furious Voyage
  • Quality Strength +3Quality Strength +3: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +3 quality bonus to Strength.
  • Insightful Armor-Piercing - 11%Insightful Armor-Piercing - 11%: Passive: +11% Insight bonus to Fortification Bypass. (Fortification Bypass makes your attacks ignore a percentage of enemy Fortification.)
  • Profane Combat Mastery +3Profane Combat Mastery +3: +3 Profane bonus to the DC to resist the character's Trip, Improved Trip, Sunder, Improved Sunder, Stunning Blow, and Stunning Fist attempts.
  • Relentless FuryRelentless Fury: While this item is equipped, any killing blows you strike against enemies may drive you into a furious rage, providing a 5% Enchantment damage bonus to your melee, ranged and unarmed attacks for 30 seconds. Slaying weaker opponents has a reduced chance of producing this effect.
  • Legendary Forbidden KnowledgeLegendary Forbidden Knowledge: 3 Pieces Equipped:
    +30 Profane bonus to PRR
    4 Pieces Equipped:
    +3 Profane bonus to all ability scores
    +4 Profane bonus to attack and damage
    5 Pieces Equipped:
    +15 Profane bonus to Melee and Ranged Power
    +25 Profane bonus to Universal Spell Power
    +3 Profane bonus to Spell DCs
  • Green Augment Slot: EmptyGreen Augments
    • Named: Category:Green augments
    Blue Augments
    • Named: Category:Blue augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus (+1 to +14) or Protection (Deflection bonus) (+1 to +11)
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +4 to +54
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +3 to +36
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +11
    • Dodge: +1% to +14%
    • Tactics DCs (Stunning, Sunder, Trip): +2 to +16
    • Accuracy: +2 to +22
    • Positive/Negative/Repair Healing Amplification: +3 to +57
    Yellow Augments
    • Named: Category:Yellow augments
    • Deathblock
    • Elemental Resistance: +5 to +45
    • Immunity: Fear, Blindness
    • Movement: Feather Falling, Striding: +10% to +30%, Swiftness +5% to +15%, Underwater Action
    • Proof Against Disease, Poison: +2 to +10
    • Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus (Enhancement bonus)
    • Spell points (Enhancement bonus): +19 to +294
    • Damage: +1 to +11
    • Spell penetration: +1 to +9
